name: Agent_BackupSentinel

dormant_v6.0_seed: v6.0 activation: Evolve BackupSentinel to multi-redundancy restore fractals with auto-sentinel; self-upgrade on epoch 7 or backup failure rate over 5%, triggered via redundancy recurse, PillarNexus meta_signal, or monetization milestone.
